articles.author: MATT O'BRIEN AP Technology Writer
articles.title: Microsoft can move ahead with record $69 billion acquisition of Activision Blizzard, judge rules - ABC News
articles.description: A federal judge has handed Microsoft a major victory by declining to block its looming $69 billion takeover of video game company Activision Blizzard
articles.content: A federal judge has handed Microsoft a major victory by declining to block its looming $69 billion takeover of video game company Activision Blizzard. Regulators sought to ax the deal saying it will … [+6384 chars]

articles.author: Betsy Klein
articles.title: Biden and NATO leaders ride wave of momentum after Turkey agrees to Sweden’s membership - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden and alliance leaders enter the first day of the high-stakes NATO Summit Tuesday with a reinvigorated sense of unity after a major win on Monday evening when Turkey agreed to Sweden’s bid to join the alliance – but the thorny issue of Ukrai…
